star-fill

DELIVERY

9 days ago

We used to order Chinese food from Canton House. You can check the records if possible.

I like Canton House really very much. But in this order the food quality has ruined all my trust over the food. I don't know the reason but maybe the chef is replaced or what. But we didn't like the food this time. It was not tasting it before.
